name: Alakazam Star
author: Masakazu Fukuda

attacks.name: Psychic Select
attacks.effect: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Skill Copy
attacks.effect: Discard a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card from your hand. Choose 1 of that card’s attacks. Skill Copy copies this attack. This attack does nothing if Alakazam Star doesn’t have the Energy necessary to use that attack. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) Alakazam Star performs that attack.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.
